respStmt.name: EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis

change.item: Text scanned at U. Chicago in 1988. Basic SGML tagging by EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis.
Final check of cardbreaks, tags, and linenumbers.
Compare with TLG text for missing words or other scanner omissions.
tagged corrupt words with the NOPARSE tag; see the text log for a list
Fixed card breaks at 84, 650 and 1010 for lines affected by metrics.

$Log: aesch.lib_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.1 2009-10-09 19:49:18 rsingh04 more reorganizing of texts module by collection
Revision 1.1 2009/10/07 20:59:53 rsingh04 began reorganizing texts module by collection. created separate work directory in texts module to keep hopper files separate from in progress files
Revision 1.3 2005/08/01 15:44:56 packel really removed item tags
Revision 1.2 2005/08/01 15:32:41 packel removed stray item tags
Revision 1.1 2005/07/25 14:27:08 packel Converted to XML
Revision 1.8 2004/04/21 20:28:10 mimno added card 1s
Revision 1.7 2003/07/01 22:14:25 yorkc Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)
Revision 1.6 2000/03/04 20:33:49 dasmith Added separate funder entity to TEI header.
Revision 1.5 2000/02/17 17:46:03 amahoney use n on sp for speeches interrupted by cardbreaks; put cards at ends of such speeches after the close tag; put sp and speaker tags on the divs of the choruses, which were not marked at all (but div2 closes sp, so we lost the speaker info)
Revision 1.4 1999/12/22 22:20:25 amahoney convert to p3

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: swth\r genou= moi cu/mmaxo/s t' ai)toume/nw|:
h(/kw ga\r e)s gh=n th/nde kai\ kate/rxomai.
tu/mbou d' e)p' o)/xqw| tw=|de khru/ssw patri\
ou) ga\r parw\n w)/|mwca so/n, pa/ter, mo/ron
ou)d' e)ce/teina xei=r' e)p' e)kfora=| nekrou=.>
ti/ xrh=ma leu/ssw; ti/s poq' h(/d' o(mh/guris
h)\ patri\ tw)mw=| ta/sd' e)peika/sas tu/xw
ou)de/n pot' a)/llo: kai\ ga\r *)hle/ktran dokw=

stei/xein a)delfh
 th
 e)mh
 pe/nqei lugrw=|
pre/pousan. w)= *zeu=, do/s me tei/sasqai mo/ron
patro/s, genou= de\ su/mmaxos qe/lwn e)moi/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: di' ai)w=nos d' i)ugmoi=si bo/sketai ke/ar.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/ ga\r lu/tron peso/ntos ai(/matos pe/doi;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: se/bas d' a)/maxon a)da/maton a)po/lemon to\ pri\n
tai de/ tis. to\ d' eu)tuxei=n,
to/d' e)n brotoi=s qeo/s te kai\ qeou= ple/on.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: di' ai(/mat' e)kpoqe/nq' u(po\ xqono\s trofou=

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)/kos, po/roi te pa/ntes e)k mia=s o(dou=

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: di/kaia kai\ mh\ di/kaia a)rxa\s pre/pon

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: ti/ fw= xe/ousa ta/sde khdei/ous xoa/s;
pw=s eu)/fron' ei)/pw, pw=s kateu/comai patri/;
po/tera le/gousa para\ fi/lhs fi/lw| fe/rein
gunaiko\s a)ndri/, th=s e)mh=s mhtro\s pa/ra;
tw=nd' ou) pa/resti qa/rsos, ou)d' e)/xw ti/ fw=,
xe/ousa to/nde pe/lanon e)n tu/mbw| patro/s.
h)\ tou=to fa/skw tou)/pos, w(s no/mos brotoi=s,
ste/fh, do/sin ge tw=n kakw=n e)paci/an;
h)\ si=g' a)ti/mws, w(/sper ou)=n a)pw/leto
stei/xw kaqa/rmaq' w(/s tis e)kpe/myas pa/lin
th=sd' e)ste\ boulh=s, w)= fi/lai, metai/tiai:
koino\n ga\r e)/xqos e)n do/mois nomi/zomen.
mh\ keu/qet' e)/ndon kardi/as fo/bw| tino/s.
to\ mo/rsimon ga\r to/n t' e)leu/qeron me/nei
kai\ to\n pro\s a)/llhs despotou/menon xero/s.
le/gois a)/n, ei)/ ti tw=nd' e)/xois u(pe/rteron.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ai)doume/nh soi bwmo\n w(s tu/mbon patro\s
le/cw, keleu/eis ga/r, to\n e)k freno\s lo/gon.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: le/gois a)/n, w(/sper h)|de/sw ta/fon patro/s.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: ti/nas de\ tou/tous tw=n fi/lwn prosenne/pw;

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: e)moi/ te kai\ soi/ ta)/r' e)peu/comai ta/de;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: au)th\ su\ tau=ta manqa/nous' h)/dh fra/sai.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: ti/n' ou)=n e)/t' a)/llon th=|de prostiqw= sta/sei;

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: eu)= tou=to, ka)fre/nwsas ou)x h(/kista/ me.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: toi=s ai)ti/ois nu=n tou= fo/nou memnhme/nh—

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)lqei=n tin' au)toi=s dai/mon' h)\ brotw=n tina—

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: kai\ tau=ta/ mou)sti\n eu)sebh= qew=n pa/ra;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pw=s d' ou) to\n e)xqro\n a)ntamei/besqai kakoi=s;

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: kh=ruc me/giste tw=n a)/nw te kai\ ka/tw,
tou\s gh=s e)/nerqe dai/monas klu/ein e)ma\s
kai\ *gai=an au)th/n, h(\ ta\ pa/nta ti/ktetai,
qre/yasa/ t' au)=qis tw=nde ku=ma lamba/nei:
peprame/noi ga\r nu=n ge/ pws a)lw/meqa
pro\s th=s tekou/shs, a)/ndra d' a)nthlla/cato
ka)gw\ me\n a)nti/doulos: e)k de\ xrhma/twn
e)n toi=si soi=s po/noisi xli/ousin me/ga.
e)lqei=n d' *)ore/sthn deu=ro su\n tu/xh| tini\
kateu/xomai/ soi, kai\ su\ klu=qi/ mou, pa/ter:
au)th=| te/ moi do\s swfroneste/ran polu\
h(mi=n me\n eu)xa\s ta/sde, toi=s d' e)nanti/ois
tau=t' e)n me/sw| ti/qhmi th=s kalh=s a)ra=s,
kei/nois le/gousa th/nde th\n kakh\n a)ra/n:
h(mi=n de\ pompo\s i)/sqi tw=n e)sqlw=n a)/nw,
su\n qeoi=si kai\ gh=| kai\ di/kh| nikhfo/rw|.”
toiai=sd' e)p' eu)xai=s ta/sd' e)pispe/ndw xoa/s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pro\s e)/ruma to/de kakw=n, kednw=n t'
kexume/nwn xoa=n. klu/e de/ moi, klu/e, se/-
bas w)= de/spot', e)c a)maura=s freno/s.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: e)/xei me\n h)/dh gapo/tous xoa\s path/r:

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: le/gois a)/n: o)rxei=tai de\ kardi/a fo/bw|.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/nos pot' a)ndro/s, h)\ baquzw/nou ko/rhs;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pw=s ou)=n; palaia\ para\ newte/ras ma/qw.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: ou)k e)/stin o(/stis plh\n e)mou= kei/raito/ nin.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)xqroi\ ga\r oi(=s prosh=ke penqh=sai trixi/.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: kai\ mh\n o(/d' e)sti\ ka/rt' i)dei=n o(mo/pteros—

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: poi/ais e)qei/rais; tou=to ga\r qe/lw maqei=n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: mw=n ou)=n *)ore/stou kru/bda dw=ron h)=n to/de;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ pw=s e)kei=nos deu=r' e)to/lmhsen molei=n;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ou)x h(=sson eu)da/kruta/ moi le/geis ta/de,
ei) th=sde xw/ras mh/pote yau/sei podi/.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: xolh=s, e)pai/sqhn d' w(s diantai/w| be/lei:
e)c o)mma/twn de\ di/yioi pi/ptousi/ moi
plo/kamon i)dou/sh| to/nde: pw=s ga\r e)lpi/sw
a)stw=n tin' a)/llon th=sde despo/zein fo/bhs;
a)ll' ou)de\ mh/n nin h( ktanou=s' e)kei/rato,
e)gw\ d' o(/pws me\n a)/ntikrus ta/d' ai)ne/sw,
ei)=nai to/d' a)gla/isma/ moi tou= filta/tou
ei)/q' ei)=xe fwnh\n eu)/fron' a)gge/lou di/khn,
ei)/per g' a)p' e)xqrou= krato\s h)=n tetmhme/nos,
h)\ cuggenh\s w)\n ei)=xe sumpenqei=n e)moi\
a)/galma tu/mbou tou=de kai\ timh\n patro/s.
a)ll' ei)do/tas me\n tou\s qeou\s kalou/meqa,
strobou/meq': ei) de\ xrh\ tuxei=n swthri/as,
smikrou= ge/noit' a)\n spe/rmatos me/gas puqmh/n.
kai\ mh\n sti/boi ge, deu/teron tekmh/rion,
podw=n o(/moioi toi=s t' e)moi=sin e)mferei=s—
kai\ ga\r du/' e)sto\n tw/de perigrafa\ podoi=n,
au)tou= t' e)kei/nou kai\ sunempo/rou tino/s.
ei)s tau)to\ sumbai/nousi toi=s e)moi=s sti/bois.
pa/resti d' w)di\s kai\ frenw=n katafqora/.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: eu)/xou ta\ loipa/, toi=s qeoi=s telesfo/rous

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: e)pei\ ti/ nu=n e(/kati daimo/nwn kurw=;

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: ei)s o)/yin h(/keis w(=nper e)chu/xou pa/lai.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: kai\ ti/na su/noisqa/ moi kaloume/nh| brotw=n;

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: kai\ pro\s ti/ dh=ta tugxa/nw kateugma/twn;

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: o(/d' ei)mi/: mh\ ma/teu' e)mou= ma=llon fi/lon.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: a)ll' h)= do/lon tin', w)= ce/n', a)mfi/ moi ple/keis;

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: a)ll' e)n kakoi=si toi=s e)moi=s gela=n qe/leis.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: ka)n toi=s e)moi=s a)/r', ei)/per e)/n ge toi=si soi=s

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: w(s o)/nt' *)ore/sthn ta/de s' e)gw\ prosenne/pw;

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: au)to\n me\n ou)=n o(rw=sa dusmaqei=s e)me/:
koura\n d' i)dou=sa th/nde khdei/ou trixo\s
i)xnoskopou=sa/ t' e)n sti/boisi toi=s e)moi=s
i)dou= d' u(/fasma tou=to, sh=s e)/rgon xero/s,
spa/qhs te plhga\s h)de\ qh/reion grafh/n.
e)/ndon genou=, xara=| de\ mh\ 'kplagh=|s fre/nas:
tou\s filta/tous ga\r oi)=da nw=|n o)/ntas pikrou/s.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: w)= terpno\n o)/mma te/ssaras moi/ras e)/xon
e)moi/: prosauda=n d' e)st' a)nagkai/ws e)/xon
pate/ra te, kai\ to\ mhtro\s e)s se/ moi r(e/pei
pisto\s d' a)delfo\s h)=sq', e)moi\ se/bas fe/rwn
mo/nos: *kra/tos te kai\ *di/kh su\n tw=| tri/tw|

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: i)dou= de\ ge/nnan eu)=nin ai)etou= patro/s,
nh=stis pie/zei limo/s: ou) ga\r e)ntelei=s
ou(/tw de\ ka)me\ th/nde t', *)hle/ktran le/gw,

a)/mfw fugh
 e)/xonte th
 au)th
 do/mwn.
kai\ tou= quth=ros kai/ se timw=ntos me/ga
pe/mpein e)/xois a)\n sh/mat' eu)piqh= brotoi=s:
ou)/t' a)rxiko/s soi pa=s o(/d' au)anqei\s puqmh\n
ko/miz', a)po\ smikrou= d' a)\n a)/reias me/gan

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: w)= pai=des, w)= swth=res e(sti/as patro/s,
siga=q', o(/pws mh\ peu/setai/ tis, w)= te/kna,
glw/sshs xa/rin de\ pa/nt' a)paggei/lh| ta/de
pro\s tou\s kratou=ntas: ou(\s i)/doim' e)gw/ pote

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: ei) mh\ me/teimi tou= patro\s tou\s ai)ti/ous:
au)to\n d' e)/faske th=| fi/lh| yuxh=| ta/de
tei/sein m' e)/xonta polla\ dusterph= kaka/.
ta\ me\n ga\r e)k gh=s dusfro/nwn mhni/mata
brotoi=s pifau/skwn ei)=pe, ta\s d' ai)nw=n no/sous,
leuka\s de\ ko/rsas th=|d' e)pante/llein no/sw|:
to\ ga\r skoteino\n tw=n e)nerte/rwn be/los
kai\ lu/ssa kai\ ma/taios e)k nuktw=n fo/bos
o(rw=nta lampro\n e)n sko/tw| nwmw=nt' o)fru\n
kai\ toi=s toiou/tois ou)/te krath=ros me/ros
bwmw=n t' a)pei/rgein ou)x o(rwme/nhn patro\s
pa/ntwn d' a)/timon ka)/filon qnh/|skein xro/nw|
kei) mh\ pe/poiqa, tou)/rgon e)/st' e)rgaste/on.
polloi\ ga\r ei)s e(\n sumpi/tnousin i(/meroi,
qeou= t' e)fetmai\ kai\ patro\s pe/nqos me/ga,
qh/leia ga\r frh/n: ei) de\ mh/, ta/x' ei)/setai.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: klu=qi\ nun, w)= pa/ter, e)n me/rei
ti/ tw=nd' eu)=, ti/ d' a)/ter kakw=n;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' e)/t' a)\n e)k tw=nde qeo\s xrh/|zwn

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: tau=ta me/n, w)= pai=, krei/ssona xrusou=,
kata\ gh=s h)/dh, tw=n de\ kratou/ntwn

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: o)llume/nas: ti/ ga\r keu/qw freno\s oi(=on e)/mpas

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: a)/tima. pa=| tis tra/poit' a)/n, w)= *zeu=;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: o(/tan d' au)=t' e)p' a)lkh=s e)pa/rh| <m'

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: ti/ d' a)\n fa/ntes tu/xoimen h)\ ta/ per
pa/qomen a)/xea pro/s ge tw=n tekome/nwn;
pa/resti sai/nein, ta\ d' ou)/ti qe/lgetai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)masxali/sqh de/ g', w(s to/d' ei)dh=|s:
e)/prasse d', a(=|pe/r nin w(=de qa/ptei,

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: le/geis patrw=|on mo/ron: e)gw\ d' a)pesta/toun
muxw=| d' a)/ferktos polusinou=s kuno\s di/kan

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: se\ toi le/gw, cuggenou=, pa/ter, fi/lois.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: ai)toume/nw| moi do\s kra/tos tw=n sw=n do/mwn.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: ka)gw/, pa/ter, toia/nde sou xrei/an e)/xw,

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: ou(/tw ga\r a)/n soi dai=tes e)/nnomoi brotw=n
ktizoi/at': ei) de\ mh/, par' eu)dei/pnois e)/sh|

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: ka)gw\ xoa/s soi th=s e)mh=s pagklhri/as
pa/ntwn de\ prw=ton to/nde presbeu/sw ta/fon.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: w)= *gai=', a)/nes moi pate/r' e)popteu=sai ma/xhn.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: w)= *perse/fassa, do\s d' e)/t' eu)/morfon kra/tos.

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: a)=r' o)rqo\n ai)/reis fi/ltaton to\ so\n ka/ra;

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: h)\ ta\s o(moi/as a)nti/dos laba\s labei=n,

sp.speaker: *)hle/ktra
sp.l: kai\ th=sd' a)/kouson loisqi/ou boh=s, pa/ter,
oi)/ktire qh=lun a)/rseno/s q' o(mou= go/non,
ou(/tw ga\r ou) te/qnhkas ou)de\ per qanw/n:
qano/nti: felloi\ d' w(\s a)/gousi di/ktuon,
to\n e)k buqou= klwsth=ra sw/|zontes li/nou.
a)/kou', u(pe\r sou= toia/d' e)/st' o)du/rmata.
au)to\s de\ sw/|zh| to/nde timh/sas lo/gon.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ mh\n a)memfh= to/nd' e)tei/naton lo/gon,
ta\ d' a)/ll', e)peidh\ dra=n katw/rqwsai freni/,

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: e)/stai: puqe/sqai d' ou)de/n e)st' e)/cw dro/mou,
po/qen xoa\s e)/pemyen, e)k ti/nos lo/gou
qano/nti d' ou) fronou=nti deilai/a xa/ris
e)pe/mpet': ou)k e)/xoim' a)\n ei)ka/sai to/de.
ta\ dw=ra mei/w d' e)sti\ th=s a(marti/as.
ta\ pa/nta ga/r tis e)kxe/as a)nq' ai(/matos
e(no/s, ma/thn o( mo/xqos: w(=d' e)/xei lo/gos.
qe/lonti d', ei)/per oi)=sq', e)moi\ fra/son ta/de.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: oi)=d', w)= te/knon, parh= ga/r: e)/k t' o)neira/twn

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: h)= kai\ pe/pusqe tou)/nar, w(/st' o)rqw=s fra/sai;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: tekei=n dra/kont' e)/docen, w(s au)th\ le/gei.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: kai\ poi= teleuta=| kai\ karanou=tai lo/gos;

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: kai\ pw=s a)/trwton ou)=qar h)=n u(po\ stu/gous;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: w(/st' e)n ga/lakti qro/mbon ai(/matos spa/sai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: h( d' e)c u(/pnou ke/klaggen e)ptohme/nh.
pe/mpei t' e)/peita ta/sde khdei/ous xoa/s,

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: a)ll' eu)/xomai gh=| th=|de kai\ patro\s ta/fw|
kri/nw de/ toi/ nin w(/ste sugko/llws e)/xein.

ei) ga to
 au)to
 xw=ron e)klipw
 e)moi\
qro/mbw| d' e)/meicen ai(/matos fi/lon ga/la,
h( d' a)mfi\ ta/rbei tw=|d' e)pw/|mwcen pa/qei,
dei= toi/ nin, w(s e)/qreyen e)/kpaglon te/ras,
ktei/nw nin, w(s tou)/neiron e)nne/pei to/de.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: terasko/pon dh\ tw=nde/ s' ai(rou=mai pe/ri.
ge/noito d' ou(/tws. ta)/lla d' e)chgou= fi/lois,
tou\s me/n ti poiei=n, tou\s de\ mh/ ti dra=n le/gwn.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: a(plou=s o( mu=qos: th/nde me\n stei/xein e)/sw,
ai)nw= de\ kru/ptein ta/sde sunqh/kas e)ma/s,
w(s a)\n do/lw| ktei/nantes a)/ndra ti/mion
do/loisi kai\ lhfqw=sin e)n tau)tw=| bro/xw|
ce/nw| ga\r ei)kw/s, pantelh= sagh\n e)/xwn,
h(/cw su\n a)ndri\ tw=|d' e)f' e(rkei/ous pu/las
kai\ dh\ qurwrw=n ou)/tis a)\n faidra=| freni\
ei) d' ou)=n a)mei/yw balo\n e(rkei/wn pulw=n
h)\ kai\ molw\n e)/peita/ moi kata\ sto/ma
a)rei=, sa/f' i)/sqi, kai\ kat' o)fqalmou\s balei=,

pri
 au)to
 ei)pei=n “podapo\s o( ce/nos;” nekro
nu=n ou)=n su\ me\n fu/lasse ta)n oi)/kw| kalw=s,
u(mi=n d' e)painw= glw=ssan eu)/fhmon fe/rein,
siga=n q' o(/pou dei= kai\ le/gein ta\ kai/ria.
ta\ d' a)/lla tou/tw| deu=r' e)popteu=sai le/gw,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)/llan dei= tin' e)n lo/gois stugei=n

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: po/nwn, o( kairo\s de\ dusfile\s gamh/-

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: lo/gw|: goa=tai de\ dh\ pa/qos kata/-
se/bei ga\r ou)/tis to\ dusfile\s qeoi=s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: diai\ *di/kas. to\ mh\ qe/mis ga\r ou)=n

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: pai= pai=, qu/ras a)/kouson e(rkei/as ktu/pon.
ti/s e)/ndon, w)= pai=, pai=, ma/l' au)=qis, e)n do/mois;

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths
sp.l: ei)=en, a)kou/w: podapo\s o( ce/nos; po/qen;

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: pro\s ou(/sper h(/kw kai\ fe/rw kainou\s lo/gous.
ta/xune d', w(s kai\ nukto\s a(/rm' e)pei/getai
ai)dw\s ga\r e)n lexqei=sin ou)k e)parge/mous

sp.speaker: *klutaimnh/stra
sp.l: ce/noi, le/goit' a)\n ei)/ ti dei=: pa/resti ga\r
kai\ qerma\ loutra\ kai\ po/nwn qelkthri/a
ei) d' a)/llo pra=cai dei= ti bouliw/teron,
a)ndrw=n to/d' e)sti\n e)/rgon, oi(=s koinw/somen

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: a)gnw\s pro\s a)gnw=t' ei)=pe sumbalw\n a)nh/r,
ei)/t' ou)=n komi/zein do/ca nikh/sei fi/lwn,
ei)/t' ou)=n me/toikon, ei)s to\ pa=n a)ei\ ce/non,
tosau=t' a)kou/sas ei)=pon. ei) de\ tugxa/nw
ou)k oi)=da, to\n teko/nta d' ei)ko\s ei)de/nai.

sp.speaker: *klutaimnh/stra
sp.l: oi)\ 'gw/, kat' a)/kras ei)=pas w(s porqou/meqa.
w(s po/ll' e)pwpa=|s, ka)kpodw\n eu)= kei/mena
nu=n d' h(/per e)n do/moisi bakxei/as kalh=s

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: e)gw\ me\n ou)=n ce/noisin w(=d' eu)dai/mosin
gnwsto\s gene/sqai kai\ cenwqh=nai: ti/ ga\r
pro\s dussebei/as <d'> h)=n e)moi\ to/d' e)n fresi/n,

sp.speaker: *klutaimnh/stra
sp.l: ou)d' h(=sson a)\n ge/noio dw/masin fi/los.
a)/llos d' o(moi/ws h)=lqen a)\n ta/d' a)ggelw=n.
a)ll' e)/sq' o( kairo\s h(mereu/ontas ce/nous
a)/g' au)to\n ei)s a)ndrw=nas eu)ce/nous do/mwn,
ai)nw= de\ pra/ssein w(s u(peuqu/nw| ta/de.
h(mei=s de\ tau=ta toi=s kratou=si dwma/twn

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: w)= po/tnia xqw\n kai\ po/tni' a)kth\
e)/oiken a(nh\r o( ce/nos teu/xein kako/n:
lu/ph d' a)/misqo/s e)sti/ soi cune/mporos;

sp.speaker: *trofo/s
sp.l: a)nh\r a)p' a)ndro\s th\n nea/ggelton fa/tin
e)lqw\n pu/qhtai th/nde, pro\s me\n oi)ke/tas
kei/nh|, do/mois de\ toi=sde pagka/kws e)/xein,
fh/mhs u(/f' h(=s h)/ggeilan oi( ce/noi torw=s.
h)= dh\ klu/wn e)kei=nos eu)franei= no/on,
eu)=t' a)\n pu/qhtai mu=qon. w)= ta/lain' e)gw/:
w(/s moi ta\ me\n palaia\ sugkekrame/na
tuxo/nt' e)mh\n h)/lgunen e)n ste/rnois fre/na.
a)ll' ou)/ti pw toio/nde ph=m' a)nesxo/mhn:
ta\ me\n ga\r a)/lla tlhmo/nws h)/ntloun kaka/:
fi/lon d' *)ore/sthn, th=s e)mh=s yuxh=s tribh/n,
kai\ polla\ kai\ moxqh/r' a)nwfe/lht' e)moi\
tla/sh|:—to\ mh\ fronou=n ga\r w(sperei\ boto\n
tre/fein a)na/gkh, pw=s ga\r ou)/; tro/pw| freno/s:
ou) ga/r ti fwnei= pai=s e)/t' w)\n e)n sparga/nois,
ei) limo/s, h)\ di/yh tis, h)\ liyouri/a
e)/xei: ne/a de\ nhdu\s au)ta/rkhs te/knwn.
tou/twn pro/mantis ou)=sa, polla\ d', oi)/omai,
gnafeu\s trofeu/s te tau)to\n ei)xe/thn te/los.
stei/xw d' e)p' a)/ndra tw=nde lumanth/rion
oi)/kwn, qe/lwn de\ to/nde peu/setai lo/gon.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pw=s ou)=n keleu/ei nin molei=n e)stalme/non;

sp.speaker: *trofo/s
sp.l: h)= pw=s; le/g' au)=qis, w(s ma/qw safe/steron.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ei) cu\n loxi/tais ei)/te kai\ monostibh=.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: mh/ nun su\ tau=t' a)/ggelle despo/tou stu/gei:
a)ll' au)to\n e)lqei=n, w(s a)deima/ntws klu/h|,
e)n a)gge/lw| ga\r kupto\s o)rqou=tai lo/gos.

sp.speaker: *trofo/s
sp.l: a)ll' h)= fronei=s eu)= toi=si nu=n h)ggelme/nois;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' ei) tropai/an *zeu\s kakw=n qh/sei pote/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ou)/pw: kako/s ge ma/ntis a)\n gnoi/h ta/de.

sp.speaker: *trofo/s
sp.l: ti/ fh/s; e)/xeis ti tw=n lelegme/nwn di/xa;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: me/lei qeoi=sin w(=nper a)\n me/lh| pe/ri.

sp.speaker: *trofo/s
sp.l: a)ll' ei)=mi kai\ soi=s tau=ta pei/somai lo/gois.
ge/noito d' w(s a)/rista su\n qew=n do/sei.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: i)/sqi d' a)ndro\s fi/lou pw=lon eu)=-

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ge/rwn fo/nos mhke/t' e)n do/mois te/koi.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: to\ de\ kalw=s kti/menon w)= me/ga nai/wn
sto/mion, eu)= do\s a)nidei=n do/mon a)ndro/s,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: nu/kta pro/ t' o)mma/twn sko/ton fe/rei,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)mo\n e)mo\n ke/rdos au)/cetai to/d': a)/-

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: su\ de\ qarsw=n, o(/tan h(/kh| me/ros e)/rgwn,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: fo/nion a)/tan tiqei/s, to\n ai)/tion d'

sp.speaker: *ai)/gisqos
sp.l: h(/kw me\n ou)k a)/klhtos, a)ll' u(pa/ggelos:
ne/an fa/tin de\ peu/qomai le/gein tina\s
mo/ron d' *)ore/stou. kai\ to/d' a)mfe/rein do/mois
pw=s tau=t' a)lhqh= kai\ ble/ponta doca/sw;
ti/ tw=nd' a)\n ei)/pois w(/ste dhlw=sai freni/;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: h)kou/samen me/n, punqa/nou de\ tw=n ce/nwn
w(s au)to\n au)tw=n a)/ndra peu/qesqai pa/ra.

sp.speaker: *ai)/gisqos
sp.l: i)dei=n e)le/gcai t' au)= qe/lw to\n a)/ggelon,
ei)/t' au)to\s h)=n qnh/|skontos e)ggu/qen parw/n,
ei)/t' e)c a)maura=s klhdo/nos le/gei maqw/n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: h)\ pu=r kai\ fw=s e)p' e)leuqeri/a|

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ei)=nai: ma/xhs ga\r dh\ keku/rwtai te/los.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths
sp.l: oi)/moi ma/l' au)=qis e)n tri/tois prosfqe/gmasin.
moxloi=s xala=te: kai\ ma/l' h(bw=ntos de\ dei=,
ou)x w(s d' a)rh=cai diapepragme/nw|: ti/ ga/r;
e)/oike nu=n au)th=s e)pi\ curou= pe/las

sp.speaker: *klutaimnh/stra
sp.l: ti/ d' e)sti\ xrh=ma; ti/na boh\n i(/sths do/mois;

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths
sp.l: to\n zw=nta kai/nein tou\s teqnhko/tas le/gw.

sp.speaker: *klutaimnh/stra
sp.l: doi/h tis a)ndrokmh=ta pe/lekun w(s ta/xos:
e)ntau=qa ga\r dh\ tou=d' a)fiko/mhn kakou=.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: se\ kai\ mateu/w: tw=|de d' a)rkou/ntws e)/xei.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: filei=s to\n a)/ndra; toiga\r e)n tau)tw=| ta/fw|
kei/sh|: qano/nta d' ou)/ti mh\ prodw=|s pote.

sp.speaker: *klutaimnh/stra
sp.l: e)pi/sxes, w)= pai=, to/nde d' ai)/desai, te/knon,
masto/n, pro\s w(=| su\ polla\ dh\ bri/zwn a(/ma

sp.speaker: *pula/dhs
sp.l: a(/pantas e)xqrou\s tw=n qew=n h(gou= ple/on.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: kri/nw se\ nika=n, kai\ parainei=s moi kalw=s.
e(/pou, pro\s au)to\n to/nde se\ sfa/cai qe/lw.
kai\ zw=nta ga/r nin krei/sson' h(gh/sw patro/s:
to\n a)/ndra tou=ton, o(\n d' e)xrh=n filei=n stugei=s.

sp.speaker: *klutaimnh/stra
sp.l: e)gw/ s' e)/qreya, su\n de\ ghra/nai qe/lw.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: tekou=sa ga/r m' e)/rriyas e)s to\ dustuxe/s.

sp.speaker: *klutaimnh/stra
sp.l: ou)/toi s' a)pe/rriy' ei)s do/mous doruce/nous.

sp.speaker: *klutaimnh/stra
sp.l: pou= dh=q' o( ti=mos, o(/ntin' a)ntedeca/mhn;

sp.speaker: *klutaimnh/stra
sp.l: mh\ a)ll' ei)/f' o(moi/ws kai\ patro\s tou= sou= ma/tas.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: tre/fei de/ g' a)ndro\s mo/xqos h(me/nas e)/sw.

sp.speaker: *klutaimnh/stra
sp.l: ktenei=n e)/oikas, w)= te/knon, th\n mhte/ra.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: su/ toi seauth/n, ou)k e)gw/, kataktenei=s.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: ta\s tou= patro\s de\ pw=s fu/gw, parei\s ta/de;

sp.speaker: *klutaimnh/stra
sp.l: e)/oika qrhnei=n zw=sa pro\s tu/mbon ma/thn.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: patro\s ga\r ai)=sa to/nde sou)ri/zei mo/ron.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: h)= ka/rta ma/ntis ou(c o)neira/twn fo/bos.
e)/kanes o(\n ou) xrh=n, kai\ to\ mh\ xrew\n pa/qe.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ste/nw me\n ou)=n kai\ tw=nde sumfora\n diplh=n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)/mole d' w(=| me/lei kruptadi/ou ma/xas
e)/qige d' e)n ma/xa| xero\s e)th/tumos

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: †kratei=tai/ pws to\ qei=on para\ to\ mh\

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)/nage ma\n do/moi: polu\n a)/gan xro/non

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)/nage ma\n do/moi: polu\n a)/gan xro/non

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: semnoi\ me\n h)=san e)n qro/nois to/q' h(/menoi,
fi/loi de\ kai\ nu=n, w(s e)peika/sai pa/qh
kai\ cunqanei=sqai: kai\ ta/d' eu)o/rkws e)/xei.
i)/desqe d' au)=te, tw=nd' e)ph/kooi kakw=n,
pe/das te xeiroi=n kai\ podoi=n cunwri/da.
ste/gastron a)ndro\s dei/caq', w(s i)/dh| path/r,
ou)x ou(mo/s, a)ll' o( pa/nt' e)popteu/wn ta/de
w(s a)\n parh=| moi ma/rtus e)n di/kh| pote/,
w(s to/nd' e)gw\ meth=lqon e)ndi/kws mo/ron
to\n mhtro/s: *ai)gi/sqou ga\r ou) le/gw mo/ron:
e)/xei ga\r ai)sxunth=ros, w(s no/mos, di/khn:
h(/tis d' e)p' a)ndri\ tou=t' e)mh/sato stu/gos,
e)c ou(= te/knwn h)/negx' u(po\ zw/nhn ba/ros,
fi/lon te/ws, nu=n d' e)xqro/n, w(s fai/nei, kako/n,
ti/ soi dokei=; mu/raina/ g' ei)/t' e)/xidn' e)/fu
sh/pein qigou=s' a)\n a)/llon ou) dedhgme/non
ti/ nin prosei/pw, ka)\n tu/xw ma/l' eu)stomw=n;
a)/rkun t' a)\n ei)/pois kai\ podisth=ras pe/plous.
bi/on nomi/zwn, tw=|de/ t' a)\n dolw/mati
toia/d' e)moi\ cu/noikos e)n do/moisi mh\
ge/noit': o)loi/mhn pro/sqen e)k qew=n a)/pais.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: e)/drasen h)\ ou)k e)/drase; marturei= de/ moi
fo/nou de\ khki\s cu\n xro/nw| cumba/lletai,
nu=n au)to\n ai)nw=, nu=n a)poimw/zw parw/n,
a)lgw= me\n e)/rga kai\ pa/qos ge/nos te pa=n,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: mo/xqos d' o( me\n au)ti/x', o( d' h(/cei.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: a)ll', w(s a)\n ei)dh=t', ou) ga\r oi)=d' o(/ph telei=,
fre/nes du/sarktoi: pro\s de\ kardi/a| fo/bos
e(/ws d' e)/t' e)/mfrwn ei)mi/, khru/ssw fi/lois
ktanei=n te/ fhmi mhte/r' ou)k a)/neu di/khs,
pra/canti me\n tau=t' e)kto\s ai)ti/as kakh=s
ei)=nai, pare/nta d'—ou)k e)rw= th\n zhmi/an:
kai\ nu=n o(ra=te/ m', w(s pareskeuasme/nos
cu\n tw=|de qallw=| kai\ ste/fei prosi/comai
feu/gwn to/d' ai(=ma koino/n: ou)d' e)f' e(sti/an
kai\ marturei=n me\n w(s e)porsu/nqh kaka\
ta/d' e)n xro/nw| moi pa/ntas *)argei/ous le/gw:
e)gw\ d' a)lh/ths th=sde gh=s a)po/cenos,
zw=n kai\ teqnhkw\s ta/sde klhdo/nas lipw/n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' eu)= g' e)/pracas, mhd' e)pizeuxqh=|s sto/ma

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: puknoi=s dra/kousin: ou)ke/t' a)\n mei/naim' e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/nes se do/cai, fi/ltat' a)nqrw/pwn patri/,
strobou=sin; i)/sxe, mh\ fo/bou nikw= polu/.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: ou)k ei)si\ do/cai tw=nde phma/twn e)moi/:
safw=s ga\r ai(/de mhtro\s e)/gkotoi ku/nes.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: potai/nion ga\r ai(=ma/ soi xeroi=n e)/ti:
e)k tw=nde/ toi taragmo\s e)s fre/nas pi/tnei.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: u(mei=s me\n ou)x o(ra=te ta/sd', e)gw\ d' o(rw=:
e)lau/nomai de\ kou)ke/t' a)\n mei/naim' e)gw\.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' eu)tuxoi/hs, kai/ s' e)popteu/wn pro/frwn

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: nu=n d' au)= tri/tos h)=lqe/ poqen swth/r,
